feed.title: Category: Book-review | Freelance ASP.NET MVC Developer in Mumbai

entry.title: Reviewing ASP.NET 5 Essentials - Packt Publishing
entry.content:
Currently I’m reviewing a book called “ASP.NET 5 Essentials” by PACKT Publishing.

It’s always fun reviewing books for PACKT Publishing.

This is my third book as a technical reviewer.

List of books reviewed

  1. Reviewed Mastering Entity Framework : Packt Publications
  2. Reviewed Entity Framework Tutorial : Packt Publications
  3. ASP.NET 5 Essentials (InProgress)

entry.title: Reviewed Entity Framework Tutorial : Packt Publications
entry.content:
It’s always a great experience to review a book technically. You should do it too.

Book will be released in August 2015.

Entity Framework Tutorial : Second Edition

entry.title: Reviewed Mastering Entity Framework : Packt Publications
entry.content:
Last year in the month of November 2014 , Project Cordinators at Packt Publications requested me to review a book for them and that book was about Entity Framwork “Mastering Entity Framework” Published.

This was my first time and it was a great experience to review a book for Packt Publication that too a book of my interest “Entity Framework”.
